a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Greenhouse gas emissions by sector, World
Greenhouse gas emissions are measured in tonnes of carbon dioxide-equivalents over a 100-year timescale.

g.text: Land-use change and forestryLand-use change and forestry

text.tspan: Note: Land-use change emissions can be negative.
